snippet: Even though Southern California smog remains the nation's worst, the air in the region this year has been at its cleanest level in the 40 years in which records have been kept.     The State Air Resources Board said that the number of the highest ...
lead_paragraph: Even though Southern California smog remains the nation's worst, the air in the region this year has been at its cleanest level in the 40 years in which records have been kept. The State Air Resources Board said that the number of the highest level of smog alert in the season that ends on Thursday was seven, just one-tenth of the number in the mid-1980's and far below the 121 such alerts in the peak year, 1977.
abstract: California Air Resources Board reports even though Southern California smog remains nation's worst, air in region in 1996 has been at cleanest level in 40 years in which records have been kept (M)

headline.main: Still Worst in U.S., California Air Is at Cleanest Level in 40 Years
